name: Smart Watch Shop
description: It is a website of smart watch.Here a user can easily review of a watch product.In this website i make dashboard. In this section I implement rechart.In this project I used  React Js, React Router, Bootstrap.

name: Medical Health Care
description: It is a website of medical health care service.A user can easily attain all services here.In this project I implement login and logout page with firebase authentication.I also used there ReactJs, React Router, React firebase Hooks, bootstrap.

name: Car Parts Manufacturer
description: This website is about parts of car Manufacturer.In this project I implement homepage included banner, tools, summary, gallery etc.In this website I make a dashboard. here all user can individually show their orders/they can also delete the order.I also implement their admin route. An admin can easily show all users order, add product, manage product.In this project I also implement stripe payment gateway.I used ReactJs, Tailwind, Daisy UI, Firebase, React Router, NodeJs, Express, MongoDB etc.
